django.core.checks.urls
=======================

.. py:module:: django.core.checks.urls


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.checks.urls.check_url_config
   django.core.checks.urls.check_resolver
   django.core.checks.urls.check_url_namespaces_unique
   django.core.checks.urls.get_warning_for_invalid_pattern

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: check_url_config(app_configs, **kwargs)

.. py:function:: check_resolver(resolver)

   Recursively check the resolver.


.. py:function:: check_url_namespaces_unique(app_configs, **kwargs)

   Warn if URL namespaces used in applications aren't unique.


.. py:function:: get_warning_for_invalid_pattern(pattern)

   Return a list containing a warning that the pattern is invalid.

   describe_pattern() cannot be used here, because we cannot rely on the
   urlpattern having regex or name attributes.


.. py:function:: check_url_settings(app_configs, **kwargs)

.. py:function:: E006(name)
